1.10.2.1.10.2-0.8.0:
- [Forge] Fluid gauges on outdated IFluidHandler tiles
- [TiCon] Drying rack progress, removed casting table progress, fixed smeltery tank appearance
 - [StorageDrawers] Better integration with 1.2.0 TOP changes
 - [IC²] Started support, EU bars (on most tiles), progress bars, teleporter coords, hU display, TFBP, probing helmet chips
1.10.2.1.10.2-0.9.0:
- All helmets are now "probifiable", this behaviour can be turned off or customized via blacklist and in-game commands (/tophelmet)
- Added client-only configs + commands (/topaddons)
- [IC²] Only show consumption/progress in extended mode
1.10.2.1.10.2-0.9.1: - Attempt at fixing the NPE on world joins
1.10.2.1.10.2-0.12.0:
- Added Hatchery support
- [BM] Mimic blocks now show the blocks they're mimicking
1.10.2.1.10.2-0.13.0:
- Chisel support (variant name)
- Architecture support
- [NeoTech] Trimmed support
1.10.2.1.10.2-0.14.0:
- [Vanilla] Animal age and breeding cooldown
- [StorageDrawers] Stacksize < 64 fix
1.10.2.1.10.2-0.14.1:
- [Blood Magic] Fix sigil behaviour in holding sigil
- Attempt at fixing Element ID mismatch NPE once and for all
1.10.2.1.10.2-0.15.0:
- [I&F] Ice and Fire support (Dragon gender and stage)
- Localized a lot of text (en, fr, nl)
- Use TextStyleClasses for formatting so users can edit appearance
- [BM] Fix unbound orb NPE in altar
- [TiCon] Now shows volume of fluids in smeltery in ingots (configurable)
- Removed Hatchery support

1.11.2.1.11.2-0.9.2:
- Port to 1.11
- Better localization handling for Forestry
- Ported Forge, Vanilla, Forestry and Storage Drawers addons to 1.11
1.11.2.1.11.2-0.10.0:
- Ported Neotech, IC², Blood Magic to 1.11
 - No more Neotech Grinder (not present in 1.11 version), removed Logger sapling error (access control)
